title: Set up AV for a Meeting
description: An event manager needs to ensure the audio-visual equipment is set up and working for a corporate meeting.

tasks.description: Review the Banquet Event Order (BEO) to see the specific AV requirements (e.g., projector, screen, microphone).
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the required equipment from the BEO.

tasks.description: Assign an AV technician to set up the equipment in the correct meeting room.
tasks.expected_outcome: A technician is dispatched to perform the setup.

tasks.description: The technician tests all equipment to ensure it is functioning correctly before the event starts.
tasks.expected_outcome: All AV equipment is tested and confirmed to be working.
